comment: Best Saturday Class EVER. I honestly hate waking up to go to my 8am saturday class because I dread waking up early but the fact that I have such an awesome professor makes it all the more better. She is sweet, cares for her students, and makes sure everyone is on the same page and is understanding the lesson being taught. Would take her again!!!!!!

I was worried at first walking into this class straight out of high school because Math was never strongest subject, especially precal but Professor Mahal makes it easy, understandable and has good tips to how to memorize certain equations or formulas. She is my all time favorite professor. Wish she was teaching calculus so I could take her again!!
her quizzes are super easy, took three so far, and got at least 100 % on two of them. easy grader! Cares about her students, and always willing to help after class! best Saterday class ever!!!
Very good professor & supper nice in person . I learned a lot in her class. Very straight forward. Attend all her classes , take notes , do H.W. &  you are passed. Always there for you.

Absolutely adorable lady. She stayed  after class to answer questions. She loves teaching . Replaces lowest test grade with final grade. I would love to take her again for Calculus II . Just love her....

Really a good professor . very nice person. Her class is straight forward. Always motivate to work hard. She does lots of examples in class. I made my first A in math just because of her good guidance and my hard work . Take her....
Very good teacher . Always ready to help you . Her grading system is very clear and helpful . Take her
She's honestly a really good professor! I would take her. The class is straight forward and the tests are almost like the review sheet just with different numbers, it's pretty easy!

Super nice professor . Very helpful. Her grading system is so helpful . Tests are very similar to the review sheet. She does a lots of examples in class . H.W. (on calcportal) is lil hard but not impossible. Take her !!!
She is  very nice lady and always willing to stay after and help you out if you are lost .Quizzes are from her notes .I would recommend her. She is very patient .

I am expecting to make my first A in calculus .I have gone to her  office so many times & she has helped  me a lot . She does a lots of examples in class.I think anyone complaining about her does not studying at all .Calculus 1 is hard what do you expect !!!

Super nice woman, very hard to understand. The notes are very long, and extensive. Attendance not mandatory, but don't miss or you'll fail. Homework is on CalcPortal and is usually impossible. Tests super hard, material on them is usually not similar to things in class but much harder. She does a lot of examples, and helps where she can.
Very nice in person . Always helpful.
I would say this is more like being in a foreign language class where you hear a little bit about numbers here and there and then take a test on something you don't remember learning...
